body_html:
@soumith,if I can,I will,why,

I installed caffe2 from source by
make &sudo make install
not by
python setup.py install
due to
CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE
not found even
echo $CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE
will print out
/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc
and 'nvcc' is actually being here

by the way,the problem is still there,can you help to reinstall it?

body:
@soumith,if I can,I will,why,
```
I installed caffe2 from source by
make &sudo make install
not by
python setup.py install
due to
CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE
not found even
echo $CUDA_NVCC_EXECUTABLE
will print out
/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc
and 'nvcc' is actually being here
```
by the way,the problem is still there,can you help to reinstall it?
